histogram.name: VRFreNotComplete
histogram.summary: Whether the user had been through the FRE when Chrome is launched in VR mode.

histogram.name: VRSessionTime
histogram.summary: The duration of the VR session. Logged when a new disjoint session has begun, or when the session has ended in a non-continuable way.

histogram.name: VRSessionVideoCount
histogram.summary: Number of videos watched in a VR session. Logged when a new disjoint session has begun, or when the session has ended in a non-continuable way.

histogram.name: VRSessionVideoTime
histogram.summary: The duration of a single session spent watching video in VR. Logged when a new disjoint session has begun, or when the session has ended in a non-continuable way.

histogram.name: VRViewerType
histogram.summary: The type of headset being used for VR.

histogram.name: XR.ARCore.DepthBufferSizeInPixels
histogram.summary: Recorded on every frame for as long as depth data is requested in an XR session backed by ARCore device. Measures the number of pixels (width * height) in the depth buffer obtained from ARCore.

histogram.name: XR.RuntimeUsed
histogram.summary: Indicates which XR runtime was used for a session. Recorded when the session was successfully created.

histogram.name: XR.WebXR.ReferenceSpace.Succeeded
histogram.summary: Records which reference spaces are successfully created when the promise returned by XRSession.requestReferenceSpace() is resolved.
